    • Method Detail

      • setStrokeColor

        public void setStrokeColor(int color)
        Sets the stroke color.

        The stroke color is the color of this shape's outline, in the integer format specified by android.graphics.Color. If TRANSPARENT is used then no outline is drawn.

        Parameters:
        color - The stroke color in the android.graphics.Color format.

      • setStrokeWidth

        public void setStrokeWidth(float width)
        Sets the stroke width.

        The stroke width is the width (in screen pixels) of the shape's outline. It must be zero or greater. If it is zero then no outline is drawn. The default value is 10.

        Behaviour with a negative width is undefined.

        Parameters:
        width - The stroke width, in screen pixels.

      • setFillColor

        public void setFillColor(int fillColor)
        Sets the fill color.

        The fill color is the color inside the shape, in the integer format specified by android.graphics.Color. If TRANSPARENT is used then no fill is drawn.

        Parameters:
        fillColor - The color in the android.graphics.Color format.

      • getStrokeColor

        public int getStrokeColor()
        Returns the stroke color.
        Returns:
        The color of the circle in ARGB format.

      • getStrokeWidth

        public float getStrokeWidth()
        Returns the stroke width.
        Returns:
        The width in screen pixels.

      • getFillColor

        public int getFillColor()
        Returns the fill color of this Shape.
        Returns:
        The fill color of the shape in ARGB format.

      • setPoints

        public void setPoints(List<GridPoint> points)

      • getPoints

        public List<GridPoint> getPoints()

      • setZIndex

        public void setZIndex(float zIndex)
        Sets the zIndex. Overlays (such as shapes) with higher zIndices are drawn above those with lower indices.
        Parameters:
        zIndex -

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Sets the visibility of the shape. If this shape is not visible then it will not be drawn. All other state is preserved. Defaults to True.
        Parameters:
        visible - false to make this shape invisible.

      • getZIndex

        public float getZIndex()
        Returns the zIndex.
        Returns:
        The zIndex of this shape.

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Checks whether the shape is visible.
        Returns:
        True if the shape is visible; false if it is invisible.

      • remove

        public final void remove()
        Removes this shape from the map.
